instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the prediction accuracy on predicting catechin content in black tea during fermentation, and how far can this metric go?

The prediction accuracy for EGC, C, EC, and EGCG of the content support vector regression (SVR) models reached 0.972, 0.993, 0.990, and 0.994, respectively. These high R-squared values indicate that the models have a strong ability to predict catechin content.
